code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';const PREFIX='codepen-clone-';const useLocalStorage=(key,initialValue)=>{const prefixedKey=PREFIX+key;const[value,setValue]=useState(()=>{const jsonValue=localStorage.getItem(prefixedKey);if(jsonValue!=null)return JSON.parse(jsonValue);if(typeof initialValue==='function'){return initialValue();}else{return initialValue;}});useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem(prefixedKey,JSON.stringify(value));},[prefixedKey,value]);return[value,setValue];};export default useLocalStorage;
